content:
CISL/CGD Joint Seminar: Transforming to Open Science: how NASA is adopting and enabling open science practices
SPEAKER: Dr. Paige Martin, NASA
DATE: Thursday, August 3, 2023
TIME: 1:00-2:00 pm MT
Location: Mesa Lab Main Seminar Room and Virtual
WEBCAST: https://operations.ucar.edu/live2-CISL

For abstract and bio, visit the seminar webpage.
As a heads up the Aug 3 seminar was shifted to 11am MT due to a scheduling conflict at 1pm.
There are still time slots available to meet with Paige in-person. Email Kristen Pierri (kpierri@ucar.edu) to sign up.
A number of us are meeting Paige at Southern Sun today at 4.45PM as part of the Front Range Open Science Teamup Apologies for the late notice, but come if you can make it!
Wish I could. Have a good time!
